summary: Provides the core utilities and abstractions for interacting with the Solr search backend used by CKAN, including functions to clear, commit, rebuild, and query the index, as well as a plugin that keeps the index synchronized with data changes.
business_intent: Maintain an up-to-date searchable catalog of CKAN datasets and resources by managing Solr index operations and ensuring real-time consistency between the database and the search engine.
